name: places/ChIJbfTu4Gv2wokR0nZFSRMqQDQ
formattedAddress: 509 W 129th St, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 509 W 129th St, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text: This is a great school. I attended this school like 2 years ago and i made great memories here. The students here are nice and inviting. The curriculum however is difficult but it prepared me for school when I moved. If you go here your student will be a step ahead of the rest. The teachers here seem rude at first but they push your child to be the best version of themselves. Also, the schedule is amazing in my opinion. If you like to wake up early, the school is opened at 7:45-8:00 but if you want to rest, the school day doesn’t start until 9. Great school

originalText.text: To be honest i feel that some teachers are engaging and fun to work with but soon feel to boring and inexperienced. i believe that the teachers need more experience. also the elective system is a horrible mess, some grades have more electives than the others and some have less. also the teachers biggest flaw is not connecting with students, and it shows, about a good 1/9 of the people i knew in the grade repeated, either because of behavior or homework/grades. Also they have horrible lunch staff and worst food. the cafeteria is filthy and the food is at horrible quality and the smell is absolutely disgusting. However on the other sides of things i do believe that this does not reflect the school as a whole. some teachers have the uncanny ability to relate to the student and make some excel in school and their is some amazing events that happen in school and their is some who i believe do a good job on spotting students that need help the most and are able to put time for them.but personally i believe that the teachers do a good job but some fall short in quality. the school lunch desperately needs to be changed. the school system as of means to learning could be better but that depends on the student. this is not a bad school to be honest however some subjects could be more engaging and if the some teachers were better trained and knew how to handle certain situations this school could be better. 3/5 out of 5. the system and curriculum needs to change right now its terribly mediocre.

originalText.text: Like the curriculum However Horrible culture for the kids, the teachers don’t show any empathy towards the kids. Instead of giving the kids an inviting atmosphere within the school they treat the kids as if their in military school. They waste too much time giving out correction rather than redirecting and engaging the kids. The teachers have no personality so therefore make the kids feel unwelcome. Horrible, Horrible Horrible.
